job_tasks.phrase: Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities focused on building and maintaining a platform, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
job_tasks.justification: This involves evaluating and integrating new technologies into existing systems, a key aspect of software development and integration, adhering to established standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring the resiliency and availability of products relates to the operational aspects of maintaining software systems, aligning with the definition of Operations & MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a productive member of the team.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to being an effective contributor within a team, which is a core aspect of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Be a productive member of the team.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates the expectation of effective teamwork and contribution, which falls under communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on traditional software engineering tasks such as designing, building, and improving a platform, implementing new technologies, and ensuring product resiliency and availability. There are no mentions of AI/ML specific tasks or technologies, nor any focus on generative AI. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and concise, explicitly stating responsibilities that align directly with core software engineering tasks. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
